query-define.name: query1
query-define.where: status=1 and est.sendtime>=to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operateroleid in ('@revRoleId@')

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct mainid,sheetid,title,endtime,senduserid from est_circuitdispatch est where status=1 and est.sendtime>=to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operateroleid = '@s1@'

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: status=1 and OPERATETYPE=113 and linkExcuteResult='101090301' and est.sendtime>=to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operateroleid in ('@revRoleId@')

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct mainid,sheetid,title,endtime,senduserid from est_circuitdispatch est where status=1 and OPERATETYPE=113 and linkExcuteResult='101090301' and est.sendtime>=to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operateroleid = '@s1@'

query-define.where: status=1 and OPERATETYPE=113 and linkExcuteResult='101090301' and est.sendtime>=to_timestamp('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.operateuserid in ('@revUserId@')
